name: 3-Seater Fabric Sofa
details: Modern 3-seater fabric sofa with a comfortable cushion and wooden legs, perfect for living rooms.

name: Leatherette Sofa
details: Elegant 2-seater leatherette sofa with a sleek design, ideal for small spaces.

name: Recliner Sofa
details: Luxurious 3-seater recliner sofa with adjustable reclining mechanisms for ultimate relaxation.

name: Sectional Sofa
details: Spacious L-shaped sectional sofa with soft fabric and extra seating space, ideal for large families.

name: Sofa Bed
details: Multi-functional 3-seater sofa bed with a foldable design for easy conversion into a bed.

name: Wooden Frame Sofa
details: Classic 2-seater wooden frame sofa with soft cushions, adding a traditional touch to your decor.

name: Velvet Sofa
details: Elegant 3-seater velvet sofa with a plush feel and royal design, perfect for luxury living spaces.

name: Compact Loveseat
details: Comfortable and stylish loveseat, ideal for small apartments or cozy corners.

name: Chesterfield Sofa
details: Classic Chesterfield sofa with deep button tufting and rolled arms, adding a timeless charm to any room.

name: Futon Sofa
details: Functional futon sofa that easily converts into a bed, offering versatility for compact spaces.
